ai.summary: Coombe Hill Purple Route is a short, easy 3.9 km hike in the UK. The route offers a gentle walk with open countryside views and low gradients, making it suitable for families and casual walkers seeking a relaxed outdoor experience.
ai.terrain_summary: Mostly well-maintained paths with a mix of gravel and grassy trails. Expect gentle ascents and occasional uneven sections; surfaces can be muddy after rain.
ai.safety_notes: Carry a map or a charged device with offline maps. Wear sturdy footwear and weather-appropriate clothing. Stay on marked paths, watch for uneven ground and shallow drops, and keep dogs under control. Be mindful of weather changes and daylight hours; carry a light if walking late.
ai.best_seasons: Spring to autumn; summer offers longer daylight and clearer views, while winter visits are more exposed and weather-dependent.

seo.meta_description: Explore the Coombe Hill Purple Route, an easy 3.9 km hike in the UK. Learn about the terrain, safety tips, and what to pack for a relaxed countryside walk.
